Title: My Haunted House
Credits: Project by Jasmine Liang, Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Prologue.Body: Welcome home! It's been years since you've visited, let's get you reaquainted with your late grandmothers home. It is yours now that you've inherited it.

Living Room.Body: You walk into the spacious living room decorated with antique furniture. Most of this room is decorated with items from your grandmothers travels over the years.

Library.Body: The library is a brightly lit room filled with shelves after shelves of books. Some of the books you need to climb up the loft to reach.

Deeper into Library.Body: You walk deeper into the library in awe of the collection of books. As you walk past two of the shelves, you hear a strange noise...

Inspect.Body: *rumble* *rumble* it's as if...someone's banging on the other side of the wall. There's a book shelf in the way.

Move Shelf.Body: You try to move the self and it doesn't budge. As you tug, a book falls out. You pick it up to put it back and you notice a keyhole on the shelf where the book was.

Unlock Secret Room.Body: You use the ornate little key to unlock the keyhole on the bookshelf. The shelf swings open, revealing a secret room behind it. What mysteries lie ahead?

Secret Room.Body: You have entered the secret room. It's filled with mysterious objects and relics from the past. Explore and uncover the secrets hidden here as you keep playing. This is the end of your tour for now.

Kitchen.Body: This is the kitchen. The maids have left the pantry stocked with food and you can still use the ingredients in the cabinets.

In Kitchen.Body: You walk around the kitchen and glance over at the dining area. Something shiny catches your eye.

Walk Over.Body: You walk towards a glass display case filled with peculiar trinkets. You reach for the shiny silver trinket box.

Open Box.Body: You open the box and inside rests an ornate little key. You put the key in your pocket, it might come in useful later.

Garden.Body: You open the glass doors and you're greeted by the scent of fresh roses and botanical plants. You see a fountain in the middle of the courtyard. This will be a good spot to read.

Hallway.Body: The second floor consists of two bedrooms and a bathroom.

Master Bedroom.Body: This is the Grand Master Bedroom, where you'll be staying. It might not be decorated to your taste now but we can work on that later.

Guest Bedroom.Body: This is the guest bedroom. I advise you to be cautious of who you invite over.

Bathroom.Body: This is the bathroom, it's filled with luxurious soaps and all the ammenties you will need.

End.Body: In shock, you walk out of the room and the shelf immediately closes. You will uncover more secrets soon.
